مشاوير
//home سائق راكب //redgister_user تسجيل حساب جديد اضافة صوره تسجيل //log in user تسجيل دخول او هل نسيت كلمة المرور "جاري تسجيل الدخول //rsest pass ارسال //main user نوع السياره مكان الذهاب عرض النتائج //list item driver عرض معلومات السائق اسم السائق : موديل السياره:
الاسم البريد الالكتروني من الى مكان بداية المشوار مكان نهاية المشوار عرض السائقين المتاحين تفاصيل الكان الحالي المكان الاساسي لايوجد تفاصيل لعرض المكان لان الاذن غير مفعل اتي بالمكان اختر المكان
Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer تسجيل دخول السائقين تسجيل دخول خروج اتصل ينا عن التطبيق سياسة الخصوصيه مشاركه للشكاوى
بالفعل تملك حساب قم بتسجيل الدخول
open close Settings
Hello blank fragment
//////////////////////////////////////////////////// Validate! The numeric field allows only numbers on it. The previous edittext was intentionally configured to accept any kind of input so that you can test the validation. The alpha field will check if the field contains only standard letters. This field will check for valid person name OR surname This field will check for valid person name AND surname
2013-07-11 or 11:23 This field will check date/datetime
2013-07-11 This field will check yyyy-MM-dd
me@andreabaccega.com The email field will only accept valid email input.\nNote that this will only perform a regular expression check
444433332222111 The credit card field will only accept valid credit card numbers. The validation is performed through the Luhn Algorithm
+41 01 12345678 The phone number will be validated using regexps It will allow several formats.\n\t- +00 01 23456799\n\t- 0123456789
andreabaccega.com The domainname check will be performed using regexps.
127.0.0.1 The ip address check will be performed using regexps.
http://www.andreabaccega.com/blog/ The check will be performed using regexps only.
… the nocheck test will always pass the test ( useful only if you want to check that the field is not empty)
This is a regular phone check ( like the previous one ).\nThe only difference is that here we\'ve a custom message for the empty case and the invalid case. Try it out! Custom test error message! Custom empty error message!
This fields validates a phone when the postUser enters something. If the postUser doesn\'t enter any data the EditText will validate!
aa This field only validates with 2 or more "a" The field validates only if the field content matches the regexp given in the xml. The current regexp is: /^[a]{2,}$/\nNote that the regexp is case sensitive so that the field won\'t validate if you enter "AA"
ciao You should enter \'ciao\' here The current check is performed by a programmatically added validator. Check out the source code. Programmatically added validator
Email OR Credit your email or creditcard number The previous field will validate only if it is not empty and one of the following is true:\n- it is a valid email address.\n- it is a valid credit card
Full Name eg Fred Bloggs Address House number, Street, Suburb, Postcode Phone number Your phone number email@address.com Email The entered phone number is invalid Full name is invalid (must be at least 2 space separated names) A contact number is required A full name is required Provided e-mail address is invalid
Password Fullname LOGIN REGISTER Not a member? Sign up now. Already registred! Login Me. Welcome LOGOUT Fullname
UPLOAD IMAGE This app needs access to your file storage so that it can read photos.
